mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_brokerage ( gmt_create, gmt_modify, handling_date, user_id, receive_type_id, receive_date, service_id, receivable, received, amount, gst, deduct_gst, bonus, adviser_id, official_id, remarks, is_close) VALUES ( now(), now(), #{handlingDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userId}, #{receiveTypeId}, #{receiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{serviceId}, #{receivable}, #{received}, #{amount}, #{gst}, #{deductGst}, #{bonus}, #{adviserId}, #{officialId}, #{remarks}, 0);
mapper.select: SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, handling_date AS handlingDate, user_id AS userId, receive_type_id AS receiveType, receive_date AS receiveDate, service_id AS serviceId, receivable, received, amount, gst, deduct_gst AS deductGst, bonus, adviser_id AS adviserId, official_id AS officialId, remarks, is_close AS isClose FROM b_brokerage WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM b_brokerage WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
